PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-07692020-10-02ECCC,  HC,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectOrder Adding a Toxic Substance to Schedule 1 to the Canadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
PrecisORDER ADDING A TOXIC SUBSTANCE TO SCHEDULE 1 TO THE CANADIAN ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION ACT, 1999 (CEPA) in order to add mitotane to the List of Toxic Substances, which would enable the Ministers to propose risk management measures for a toxic substance under CEPA to manage potential environmental risks associated with mitotane.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2020-0217 Publication Date: 2020-10-28
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Order Adding a Toxic Substance to Schedule 1 to the Canadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
precis: ORDER ADDING A TOXIC SUBSTANCE TO SCHEDULE 1 TO THE CANADIAN ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION ACT, 1999 (CEPA) in order to add mitotane to the List of Toxic Substances, which would enable the Ministers to propose risk management measures for a toxic substance under CEPA to manage potential environmental risks associated with mitotane.
